text: The Babadook is a 2014 British psychological horror drama movie, written and directed by Jennifer Kent as her directorial debut.SA horror film The Babadook to make a profit thanks to significant overseas success - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation) It is about a woman and her son being tortured by an evil spirit based on a child's book. The movie stars Essie Davis and Noah Wiseman, while Daniel Henshall, Hayley McElhinney, Barbara West, and Ben Winspear appear in supporting roles. The Babadook was produced by Causeway Films (Kristina Ceyton) and is based on the short movie Monster (2005), also written and directed by Kent. The movie was shown at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival and received positive reviews. On Rotten Tomatoes' aggregation, it was ranked as the third most-liked movie of the year. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * * * The Babadook trailer at Fliks.com.au * How Jennifer Kent made The Babadook at SBS Movies Category:2014 drama movies Category:2014 horror movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:2010s supernatural movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Australian horror movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:English-language movies
title: The Babadook
